item.title: SugarCRM deployment process
item.description: SugarCRM is a Customer Relationship Management system for both Enterprise and small business. Iâ€™ve worked on SugarCRM for around 6 years, and this post is going to cover off how we release/deploy the software on a 2 week cycle. The Aim As with any software, the aim is to have an automated release process first and foremost. We wanted this process to be simple and allow for a completely automated release to our staging platform on a nightly basis.
